item.description:
So, we'll be running a day-time game on Friday to celebrate the 4th as opposed to a night game. Our guess is that you will likely celebrate illuminated in other ways. ;-)

I will bring my camera to take pics , so bring your smiles in addition to your agua.

Here's the agenda:

  • 12:00 - Toss the disc around, meet folks, be merry
  • 12:20 - Overview of the rules, safety, etc - then divide into teams
  • 12:30 - Play!!!!!!
  • 2:00 - Conclude the meetup with snacks and socializing

Here's what we humbly ask of you (works great as a checklist):

  • Please RSVP so we can accommodate accordingly
  • Please bring water
  • Please arrive on time if you can
  • If you are a regular, please consider bringing a buck for the Frisbee Fund

As usual, we will supply the frisbees, cones, lanyards, first aid supplies (hopefully will never be used) and our pretty smiles. As we periodically mention, all these supplies are paid out-of-pocket by your loving Frisbee organizers and everyone has been so generous with their donations to-date. Thank you and let's keep the dream alive!

-Joe
item.how_to_find_us: Head over to the Football Field...we'll be playing there.
item.name: Frisbee the 4th! (Day-time @ Russell Field)
